ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAuthority for CBC/Radio-Canada be granted Governor in Council authority, pursuant to paragraph 48. (2) (a) of the BROADCASTING ACT, to dispose of the assets of Galaxie for a consideration in excess of four million dollars.
